skill.name: Discussions & Context
skill.description: Managing conversation state, memory, and context zones.
skill.content:
# Discussion Management
## Persistent Chat ```python from lollms_client import LollmsDiscussion, LollmsDataManager
db = LollmsDataManager("sqlite:///my_chat.db") discussion = LollmsDiscussion.create_new(lc, db_manager=db)
discussion.chat("My name is Alice.") discussion.memorize() # Extracts facts to long-term memory ```
## Context Zones Manipulate what the AI sees: ```python discussion.user_data_zone = "User Level: Expert" discussion.system_prompt = "You are a Linux terminal."
status = discussion.get_context_status() print(status['current_tokens']) ```
